H0.text: A skink is what type of reptile. Snake

H1.text: A skink is what type of reptile. Turtle

H2.text: A skink is what type of reptile. Crocodile

H3.text: A skink is what type of reptile. Lizard

A4.text: Skinks are lizards that comprise all species within the family Scincidae, which is part of the infraorder Scincomorpha.

A5.text: Skinks are lizards, not snakes, turtles, or crocodiles.
